# Stunning Barrier, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 3]], [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level or until discharged 

**Saving Throw:** None and Will negates (see text)

**Spell Resistance:** No and yes (see text)

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 194

This spell functions as *[[Stunning Barrier (Spell)|stunning barrier]]*, except as noted above, and it provides a +2 bonus to AC and on saving throws. It is not discharged until it has [[Stunned|stunned]] a number of creatures equal to your caster level.
